E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 4/17/1985
Subject: David Golden healing process
David Golden is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1985
Subject: Status of Cordell Montoya
Dear Sir,
Cordell Montoya has an AVG of .215 at AA Scituate Somersets!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Friday, 5/16/1985
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more playing time.
I hope you put me in the starting lineup more often!

Regards,
Michael Hebron

Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Donald Payeur

Date: Wednesday, 7/30/1985
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:

in return for

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
New Jersey GM
